snippet.title: Sock It STEAM NEXT FEST Trailer
snippet.description:
Guess what? Sock It's part of Steam Next Fest this year!

Check out the demo here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1957430/Sock_It/

Join the Discord! https://discord.com/invite/EDwmxRQCYK

It's a reused trailer, but I spiffed up the demo for the last time. There's even a secret boss if you beat it without getting put down once!

If you like Punch Out, and games that go the extra mile to be distinct, you should check it out.

Store page description:

Enter Sock It, the Devil May Punch Out like with crazy combos, hilarious cutscenes, and spectacle based running stages!

Fight 12 unique fighters, all with their own mechanics and fighting styles! This includes an actor alien, a musical mantis shrimp, and 3 LARPers that fight you at ONCE!

There's also a complete narrative! Follow the boxer Alpha Piston as he awakes in the future after a mysterious incident that claimed his arms. He must deal with many strange characters, like a robotic nurse, a devious extortionist, and a... peculiar assassin! Find out what happened to Alpha Piston that fateful night!

Running stages are also there to break up the action! Keep your blood pumping and punch through a gang of fridges, bosses, and more!

The game is super replayable too! Replay stages to get high scores, then face the Title Defense rounds to really test your skill

Sock It is a mostly-solo dev endeavor coming out this fall on Steam! Go wishlist it and play the demo!
